text: Jose Roberto Alves (born 13 October 1954) was a Brazilian football player. == Club career == He mainly played for clubs in Brazil. He also played for Pohang Steelers of the South Korean K League, then known as the POSCO Dolphins. He was first foreign player of K League with Sergio Luis Cogo.다국적군 무대가 된 한국 프로축구 He only appeared in K League (5 matches) Official Records at K League ==References== ==External links== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Pohang Steelers players Category:Chinese Super League players Category:K League 1 players
title: Jose Roberto Alves
